Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-la
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: semayinimi behayili genebanati፡፡ inyami be’irigit’i chayochi neni፡፡
tigenezebumi zenidi kenegeru hulu huleti (tek’arani) ‘ayinetini fet’erini፡፡
«wede alahimi shishu፤ ine le’inanite kerisu gilits’i asit’enik’ak’i nenyina» (belachewi)፡፡
ke’alahimi gari lelani amilaki atadirigu፡፡ ine le’inanite ke’irisu (yetelakihu) gilits’i asiferari nenyina፡፡
(negeru) inidezihu newi፡፡ ineziyani ke’inerisu befiti yeneberutini kemelikitenya manimi alimet’achewimi፡፡ (irisu) «digimitenya weyimi ‘ibidi newi» yalu bihonu iniji፡፡
be’irisu (bezihi k’ali) adera tebabilewalini? ayidelemi፤ inerisu t’igabenyochi hizibochi nachewi፡፡
ke’inerisumi (kirikiri) zeweri beli፤ (tewachewi)፡፡ anite minimi tewek’ashi ayidelehimina፡፡
ganeninina sewinimi ligigezunyi iniji lelela alifet’erikwachewimi፡፡
kenerisumi minimi sisayi alifeligimi፡፡ limegibunyimi alishami፡፡
alahi irisu sisayini sech’i yebiritu hayili balebeti newi፡፡
le’ineziyami lebedeluti inide gwadenyochachewi fanita bit’e (yek’it’ati) fanita alilachewi፡፡ silezihi ayasichekulunyi፡፡
leneziyami lekaduti keziya kemik’et’eruti k’enachewi weyolachewi፡
